#summary System properties used to configure Window Licker
#labels Draft


The default behaviour of Window Licker can be tweaked by setting system properties.

|| *Property* || *Purpose* || *Default* ||
|| com.objogate.wl.poll-delay || The time that the Prober waits between polls of a probe || ||
|| com.objogate.wl.timeout || The maximum time that the Prober will wait for a probe to execute successfully. || ||
|| com.objogate.wl.keyboard || The name of the keyboard layout.|| The current input locale. ||
|| windowlicker.end-of-test-pause || || ||
